title: Replace Santanu Sir's teacher profile image with newly uploaded photo

requirements.summary: Store the uploaded Santanu Sir photo as a static asset in the frontend assets directory
acceptanceCriteria: The image file is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Both Teachers and TeachersNotes components reference this asset path
The image loads correctly when the components render

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded image 'image (2)-5.jpg' showing Santanu Sir in a white patterned shirt with mustache speaking at a microphone with decorative background including silver streamers and floral wall decorations as a static asset with standardized naming convention matching other teacher profile images

requirements.summary: Replace the existing teacher profile image for Santanu Sir in the Teachers component with the newly uploaded photo
acceptanceCriteria: The Teachers component displays the new Santanu Sir photo from 'image (2)-5.jpg'
The image replaces the previous Santanu Sir profile photo
The image is properly sized and styled to match other teacher profile images
All other teacher profile content (name, classes, subjects, experience) remains unchanged

file_operations.description: Update the image source for Santanu Sir's profile to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/santanu-sir-new.dim_400x400.jpg instead of the current placeholder. Maintain all existing styling, dimensions, and teacher information (name, classes taught, subjects, experience, focus areas). Ensure the Avatar component continues to use the same size and styling as other teacher profiles.

requirements.summary: Update the TeachersNotes component to reference the new Santanu Sir profile image for consistency
acceptanceCriteria: The TeachersNotes component displays the same new Santanu Sir photo in the Class 4-12 notes card
The image matches the one used in the Teachers component
All other notes card content remains unchanged
